mapper.insert: insert into alarm(user_id, type, table_id, msg) values (#{userId}, #{type}, #{tableId}, #{msg})
mapper.delete: delete from alarm where checked = true and date(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) > date(created_at)
mapper.select: select id, user_id, type, checked, table_id, msg, created_at from alarm where user_id = #{userId} order by created_at desc
